title: Metglobal’s Founder Metin Altun joins GTEC in ChinaTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Metglobal’s Founder Metin Altun joins GTEC in China
Metglobal, technology powerhouse and group of companies, participated in Global Travel and E-Commerce Conference (GTEC) 2015 in China between the dates of Sep 21 to 23. This year’s GTEC focused on the travel industry in China with the theme of “Internet Plus”, which highlighted the importance of technology in offering a seamless distribution and customer experience. The topic was central to Metglobal’s successa as they harness brands such as otel.com, HotelsPro, tatil.com and gezi.com, an upcoming brand. The company attended the conference with Metin Altun, founder of Metglobal and talked about the company, its strong portfolio of diverse brands and elaborated more on future plans for growth.
With multiple strong participants from the tourism industry across the globe, Metin Altun was present at the ‘Phocuswright Fast Track’ Phocuswright panel and conversed at the Executive Roundtable. CEO of Metglobal, Metin Altun, stressed that success of a company is dependent on their employees and their passion. Innovation starts within the company rather than solely focusing on external demands. His passion is to make employee workforce of Metglobal as the company’s core competency.
Altun underlined, “customer engagement is crucial for companies to become leaders of their industry. In order to achieve this, at Metglobal, our Business Intelligence department conducts in-depth research to predict shopping behavior using big data. These insights improves our practice in personalizing our offerings, especially to simplify customer decision making process and offer more economic choices to our clients”. Metin Altun passionately explained that he is always looking to make Metglobal a more data-driven organization and create the spirit of innovation through encouraging employees with opportunities to develop software. According to Altun, culture of a company is very important and it is the differentiating factor. Metglobal positions itself as an innovation company that can find solutions to simplify lives of its customers.
After the conference, Tony D’Astolfo, Managing Director of Phocuswright Inc., expressed, “It’s always great to get insights from the ‘C‘ suite and the feedback for this session from the conference delegates was extremely positive. It’s rare to assemble accomplished executives from 4 different regions of the world on one panel, and the mix made for a very interesting and dynamic session. Mr. Metin Altun added valuable insights to the panel and we were glad that he participated”.
Source:-GTEC
